subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: No Yankee executive is following the impetuous example of the silent patriarch, George Steinbrenner, by issuing win-or-else edicts. In fact, no one is saying much of anything.
snippet: No Yankee executive is following the impetuous example of the silent patriarch, George Steinbrenner, by issuing win-or-else edicts. In fact, no one is saying much of anything.
